What is the shining stuff on it?

Seem the Fariy Enssence is still enought.\.
Now you need to chose a token to brorrow power from.
Of the four tokens, three can imbue you with power—the \C[6]ring,
The craft bag is... something else.\|
Alice holds the ring, the book, and the arrow out toward you.
This will decide the role you'll take on in this twisted world.
This ring is well know as the ring of Nibelungen.\|
If you chose to wield the power within it.
You would be grant power of the great hero from Norse,\.
the source of all dragon slayer.
Yes, I want wield it's power
Yes, I want wield it's power
This grimoire was written by a great sage,\|
recorded the rise and dimise of his king.
If you wish to accept the willing of the grand sorcerer,\.
you would be fill with wisdom pf magic
Yes, I want accept his will
Yes, I want accept his will
This is the last arrow been shot by a great outlaw,\.
he stand with the people againest injustice.
you will be his successor againest evil.
I...\. I can feel it...\. the strength.
Seems the power of dragon slayer fits you very well.
Look like you have talent on magic.
Well look like you are his perfect sucessor
Now you've been granted the power of a hero,\.
That’s where Rumpelstiltskin's craft bag comes in.\|
This token can be used as a medium for alchemy.
With the right formula, materials, and a little fairy essence,\|
we can craft items, weapons, and armor\.,no smith needed.
This book contains the formula I have collected.\|
Let me see what we need.
You can now use monument to save your game.

Go explore and gather the materials so we can make it.
Maybe I should go around for some clues.

What is this place?\| And who are you?
We're at the edge of Emerald Glade, \|
a breeding ground for fairy tales.
As for me... I'm Alice. Just a traveler, like you.
What matters is we come from the same place.
Right now, we're both trapped in this realm of fairy tales.
Are you saying we’re inside a storybook?
This is where fairy tales come to life.
But the characters you meet here won’t always play the
roles you know from the stories.
This is their reality now, and their actions might
Not follow the narratives?\! What does that mean?\!
Are they going to hurt us?
Do you know how to get back to our world?
The journey is filled with dangers and challenges.
You said this world isn’t as nice as the stories,
\!I'd rather take the one we have some control over.
Sigh... You're right. \.According to what I’ve learned,\|
the only way to return home is by collecting six Tokens
I’ve managed to collect a few already.\|
Alice pulls out a golden ring, a book, a small craft bag, and a arrow.
That’s four of them. We only need to collect three more.
Each token is harder to find than the last, and the stories
guarding them have a way of twisting in unpredictable ways.
I wasn't collecting those by myself, \.
on fact I used to have few friend with me.
And they...\. have becamed the token you see
Does that mean... your friends became these tokens?
Yes. They were once my companions.\|
But the stories we faced twisted in ways none of
They paid the price, and now...\|
they're part of this world, bound to these items.
Alice's voice softens as she speaks,
the weight of her memories hanging in the air.
Don’t be. If we’re going to survive here,\|
we need to focus on the path ahead.
Which means... we need to arm you.
In this world, there are two ways to gain power.
The first is to become a character in the story, just like
By re-enacting the tale, I earned the abilities of my role.
Her voice carries a hint of pride, but beneath it lies a trace of sorrow.
The second way,\.is through the power of these tokens.
Each token holds a unique strength. \|
Some can be used as mediums to channel \C[10]Fairy Essence\C[0],
On your way here, you may have passed a broken story monument.\|
It still holds some remnants of Fairy Essence.\|
With that material, we can strengthen you.
We better move now before all the Fairy Essence fade out.

We found you on the ground and injured seriouly.
I was on my way to visit my grandma who lives in the forest,\.
suddenly...\. a giant wolf attacked me.
I—I tried to fight it off.\.
But, I can't fight it with bare hand.
I manage to run away from it,\.
but I have loss too much blood and fall in a coma.
But how did I manage to escape?
Something’s wrong! It should’ve easily caught up to me…
\|Unless its real target wasn’t me, but… \.Grandma!
If it’s heading for someone else, we have to act fast.
You’re right.\. We can’t waste any time!
There’s no way I’m letting it get away with this.
But you are still bare-hand? You better stay somewhere safe.
Just give us the direction, we will make sure her safty.
No. I can’t let you risk your life for my sake.\|
This is my fight, and I’m not staying behind. I will go with you.
If you insist. Here use this for now.
Alice hand over a wood club.
